content: example 12 row is about 4 inches round 35 switch color do single_crochet in each stitch drawstring i use the half i-cord to make the draw string i found a youtube vdo for help of how to make the half i- cord here https //youtube com/shorts/timxudarllo si=iyrno_jfgqjihroc flowers magic_ring 5sc into the ring change color sl * 2ch 3dc in the same st 2ch * repeat from * this make 5 pedals make 4 flowers for each end put the drawstring in between 2 flowers and use the yarn with same color as flower to sew the 2 flowers together handle pattern #1 pattern may be hard to understand a youtube video may help there are quite a few of them i can recommend one crochet cord by @crochetbyjen4410 round 1 ch2 single_crochet into 1st st turn the work inward and esc into the side st round 2 turn work inward insert the hook into the 2 sts on the side facing you and do an esc repeat rnd2 until you reach the length 18 inches make 2 pattern #2 this handle is using a simple i-cord pattern recommend https //www youtube com/watch v=sc3cr36su9m i m using a double end knitting size 5mm to help holding the loose loops so i wont miss them here s the project with icord handle
